data.title: Yo-Kai Watch - Season 2: Episode 26
data.meta_description: When Nate and his classmates are enjoying a field trip under blue skies, a rainstorm suddenly hits the area. It is caused by Drizzelda, a Yo-kai who has inspirited Katie. Nate summons Jibanyan, but he has no desire to do anything because he hates getting wet. Suddenly, Ray O'Light appears--a Yo-kai who can bring a nice sunny day even on a day with 80 percent chance of rain! His desperate attempt to make Drizzelda smile does not work, but the situation drastically changes after a certain incident.
